_sText:
This was a map i made for a WCS server and to test out some bits.
I really Enjoyed how the HDR lighting came out as i never used it before.
It does make the map look alot better.

Basically it has 4 lvls.
Bottom lvl, for people who like to rush straight to the next spawn as quick as possible.
Second lvl, is the spawns, where you can run around the side to get to the other side.
Third lvl, for people who like a lot of cover, slowest way.
Fouth lvl is the sniper's corrider, great place to see the map, but it is exposed.
